title: Reparameterized property
body_html:
This PR adds support for reparameterized sampling for distributions:

  • sample and sample_n now have requires_grad parameter, which acts a switch for reparameterized sampling
  • Samplers of non-reparameterized distributions throw error
  • add tests for sample and sample_n with requires_grad=True

body:
This PR adds support for reparameterized sampling for distributions:
- `sample` and `sample_n` now have `requires_grad` parameter, which acts a switch for reparameterized sampling
- Samplers of non-reparameterized distributions throw error
-  add tests for `sample` and `sample_n` with `requires_grad=True`
